category: Human Rights Management Regulations/Article 5 (Protection of Human Rights of Gyeonggi-do)
contents: Article 5 (Protection of human rights of athletes) ① The Korea Sports Association recognizes that athletes are at the center of the Olympic Movement in accordance with Chapter 1, Article 3 of the Olympic Charter and operates a development system centered on athletes. ② The Sports Council provides support to ensure that the human rights of athletes are not violated throughout the entire process of sports activities. Revised 2019. 11. 7. ③ Deleted 2019. 11. 7. [Title revised 2019. 11. 7.]
